moves.name: Ancient Power
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of raising the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

passives.name: Sand Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a sandstorm.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up moves in a pinch.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 1
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
